lead_paragraph: Along with Vista Equity Partners, Thoma Bravo is one of the few specialists who focus solely on taking over aging tech companies and then turning them around.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

headline.main: Thoma Bravo Raises $7.6 Billion Fund to Pursue More Tech Deals

snippet: Along with Vista Equity Partners, Thoma Bravo is one of the few specialists who focus solely on taking over aging tech companies and then turning them around....
